subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Now 65 and walking with the use of a cane, the slightly stooped Joe Frazier reflected on the iconic fight in Quezon City in 1975 during a wide-ranging interview.
snippet: Now 65 and walking with the use of a cane, the slightly stooped Joe Frazier reflected on the iconic fight in Quezon City in 1975 during a wide-ranging interview.
